ProductInfo.Features:

<7> 58mm UV Filter + <8> RC-6 Shutter Remote Control + <9> Precision Design DSLR300 Flash + <10> Xit 12" Flexible Tripod +
<11> PD HDMI to Mini-HDMI Cable + <12> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <13> PD 8 SD Card Memory Card Case + <14> LCD Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS 70D Digital SLR Camera Body with 75-300mm III Lens + 64GB Card + Backpack + Flash + Battery/Charger + Tripod Kit
